alert.note: Alert for Portage (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 10:28AM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River below Whiting Dam affecting Portage County. For the Wisconsin River...including Merrill, Rothschild, Whiting Dam, Stevens Point...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...The river is expected to rise above flood stage later today or early on Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Wisconsin River below Whiting Dam. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1053.0 feet, Widespread flooding in wooded land adjacent to the river. Floodwaters approach homes in low-lying areas on Park Drive west of Plover. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:10 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1052.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1053.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1053.6 feet on 02/23/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
